title: PVP.net patcher nernel has stoped working
body: i just bough a new win10 PC when i finish download LOL and try to open it it just keeps get me that  PVP.net patcher nernel has stopped working thing also i have try everything that is online and on the boards it just doesn't work so someone plz help me!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried launching the game as Administrator?
Are you launching the game from the shortcut or your taskbar? Please try launching the game from within the installation directory instead.
i had try launch as administrator and i try run the game inside the folder where i put LOL it just doesn't work. ty tho
Have you tried launching the game in compatibility mode?
yes i had and it didn't work at all. ty

Hey there,

Could you do the following for me;

* [Download](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) and run the HRT.
* Select **'Gather System & LoL Logs'**
* Locate the LoL-Logs.zip file (Saved to your desktop) and upload to a file host of your choice, reply with a link to the file.
